name: Young Mithral Dragon
description: The Young Mithral Dragon is a majestic large dragon with shimmering metallic scales, embodying both strength and elegance. It moves with grace, showcasing its great agility and fierce presence in combat.
memorable: This dragon is capable of ending magical effects and has immunity to slashing damage, presenting unique challenges during encounters.
goals: The Young Mithral Dragon often seeks to guard its territory and treasures, but it can also engage in alliances if presented with the right incentives.
relations: It may serve as an ally to good-aligned adventurers, while suitably powerful foes can challenge its might.
environment: Typically found in mountainous regions or caves that contain precious metals and gems.
strengths: Exceptional Perception allows it to detect hidden foes, while Magic Resistance enhances its survival in magical confrontations.
weaknesses: While agile, it still has a manageable speed compared to other high-flying dragons.
attacks: The dragon's Multiattack includes a powerful Bite that can negate magical effects and two Claw attacks that can inflict ongoing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Shard Breath unleashes a cone of metallic shards that can deal significant damage and create difficult terrain.
senses: The dragon has blindsight up to 30 feet and a passive Perception score of 19, making it highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: It excels in Insight and Perception, allowing for heightened awareness and understanding of its environment.
additional_information: The Young Mithral Dragon is charm-proof, making it a reliable fighter against enchantments.
Its presence can inspire awe and fear, affecting interactions with other creatures.
The dragon's breath weapon creates lasting effects on the battlefield.
With its high Dexterity, it possesses valuable stealth capabilities.
It communicates using telepathy, enhancing its engagement in tactical discussions.
